parameters.html:
<style>
        /* Inline CSS for the banner container */
        .banner {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 474px; /* Adjust the height as needed */
            overflow: hidden; /* Hide any parts of the video that overflow */
            z-index: 0; /* Ensure the video stays in the background */
            -webkit-mask-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, black, transparent);
            mask-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, black, transparent);
        }

        /* Inline CSS for the video */
        .video-banner {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            object-fit: cover; /* Cover the full area of the banner */
        }
    </style>
    <div class="banner">
        <video class="video-banner" autoplay loop muted playsinline>
            <source src="hippograph vid banner.mp4" type="video/mp4">
        </video>

parameters.html: Seamlessly turn your uploaded files, messages, and data into a dynamic knowledge graph, making every piece of information work for you.

parameters.styleCss:
background-color: #04161340;
backdrop-filter: blur(10px); /* Blur effect on the content behind the div */

parameters.html: Experience unparalleled observability into the foundational LLM models, with interactive chat that exposes the sources and interconnections of your data's knowledge graph. Watch it think in front of your eyes.

parameters.styleCss:
background-color: #04161340;

parameters.html: Automatically and dynamically define the structure of your knowledge graph in a manner that is most useful for any task you need.

parameters.html: Experience unparalleled observability into the foundational LLM models, with interactive chat that exposes the sources and interconnections of your data's knowledge graph. Watch it think in front of your eyes.

parameters.styleCss:

parameters.html: Automatically and dynamically define the structure of your knowledge graph in a manner that is most useful for any task you need.
Visualization

parameters.text: Dive into your knowledge graph with ease, connecting concepts and extracting insights through a user-friendly graphical interface. The generated subgraphs that accompany the LLM’s responses are there for you to explore and verify the veracity of the answers you are given.

parameters.html: Foundation Models

parameters.text: Your choice of foundation models: GPT4, GPT3.5, Gemini Pro/Ultra, Llama 2, Claude 2/3,  Mixtral-8x7B

parameters.html: Custom Extraction

parameters.text: Define your custom objective in our model-assisted pipeline, allowing you to fine-tune it before using it to digesting your data and return your information, with annotation and sourcing included.

parameters.html: REST API

parameters.text: Unlock the full potential of your applications with our REST API—effortlessly query our knowledge graph and enrich your data with dynamic structuring capabilities. Get started now and transform the way you handle data.

background-color: #04161340;

parameters.functionScript:
if (!Inputs.activeQueryArray) return

Outputs['Matches Small Mobile'] = Inputs.activeQueryArray.includes('Small Mobile')
Outputs['Matches Regular Mobile'] = Inputs.activeQueryArray.includes('Regular Mobile')
Outputs['Matches Tablet'] = Inputs.activeQueryArray.includes('Tablet')
Outputs['Matches Regular Desktop'] = Inputs.activeQueryArray.includes('Regular Desktop')
Outputs['Matches Large Desktop'] = Inputs.activeQueryArray.includes('Large Desktop')
